Though personally unknown to you, I have long been acquainted with you be repute, & have known intimately many of your scientific friends, among them I may mention the late Ludwig Becker, Prof. McCoy, & Dr Mueller. I resided for several years in Melbourne & Sydney, & was staying with Geo. F. Angas at the time that the Novara visited N. S. Wales.
